step_original: Particular provisions: Other than cats and dogs fur as mentioned by Regulation (EC) No 1523/2007 (OJ L 343)

step_description.en: Trade in items containing cat and dog fur is only permitted in exceptional circumstances
step_description.cy: Dim ond mewn amgylchiadau eithriadol y caniateir masnachu mewn eitemau sy'n cynnwys ffwr cath a ch≈µn

step_howto_description.en: You will need to do the following for your goods to circulate freely:
step_howto_description.cy: Dim ond os ydych chi'n mewnforio cynhyrchion sy'n cynnwys ffwr o'r fath at ddibenion addysgol neu dacsidermi y caniateir masnach.
